law.catch_line: The Commission shall meet at the call of the chair, a majority of the members, or the Governor....

text.section: The Commission shall meet at the call of the chair, a majority of the members, or the Governor.

A member of the Commission:
may not receive compensation as a member of the Commission; but
is entitled to receive reimbursement for expenses under the Standard State Travel Regulations, as provided in the State budget.
